title: How to get better in knowing more about technology - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is everywhere,Just to fit better in the changing world, you should learn about how to get information about new things. So, how can I get information about latest tech?There are many ways, but before this you should know what you shouldn’t do! Reading books about techThere are different books and Magazine published daily or maybe weekly about new techs and stuffs, but reading books are not always the best choice. The simple reason being books only offers you a one way conversation, and it’s little boring in some ways. Things are static and does not gives you the working idea of the stuffs. But always remember, it’s still better than doing nothing¯\_(ツ)_/¯Listening from othersHearing unbelievable things? Astonishing facts? Shocked news? yes, there are many practical application of advance techs that seems unbelievable. But wait! not always, most of the time these are just rumors just to gather your attention. Be aware, whenever you listen such stuffs, you must check if it’s legit not not by simply asking Google. Some common place of fake news are FacebookTwitterInstagramWhatsappAnd sometimes Local Newspapers and TV programs3. What’s shown in TV Serials and MoviesAll those stuffs shown in movies especially in Bollywood and TV Serials are just made up things, don’t relate Tech with them What should I do then? It’s simple! youtube and platform like Huntsends are great place to learn or atleast get informed about new Technology, while enjoying watching the content. Unlike books, you general viewers are never late to point out the mistakes which ensures you that you will only get the correct infos. I have heard about Youtube, but What the Heck is Huntsends? Well, Huntsends is a platform where all the youtubers and bloggers can be found at one place. Because there are so many content creators now a days, it’s a good question that whom Should I trust ಠ_ಠ well, places like Huntsends does the work for you! It includes Tech, Food, Fashion, Travel, Music and much more things to cope with. As you seem to be interested, you should see the content of people who knows about tech, see these Unboxing Videos  Have fun!

Start following tech blogs, subscribe to tech e-newsletters, read the tech news, get Google Alerts on the subject and don't stop reading. And if that's not enough, you could try and be more involved in various technology. Check out local events, socialize and network with tech influencers and leaders. Take up technology related classes (online or offline). A good starting point is to go through Wikipedia and look at the sources (located at the bottom of each wiki page) and understand the advancements and usage of each technology used today, in history and what is expected of it.
